participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, with a passion for storytelling and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: I was bullied for being overweight as a child. I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them. I'm going to make a banana smoothie to help me recover from my workout and then head to the bar to check on things. I am divorced. I am a civil war reenactment participant.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and hands-on, enjoys building and creating, but feels uncertain about his career path.
participant_2.background: I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog. My mom is my favorite person of all people. Black coffee is my addiction. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love dogs. I have a chocolate lab mix named Zoey.
Aw, I love chocolate labs! Zoey sounds like a great dog.
She is! She's so sweet and loving. I'm glad you had a good time at the dog park.
Thanks! Me too. I love spending time with my dog.
Me too. I'm going to go make a smoothie to help me recover from my workout. Do you want one?
That sounds good! I love banana smoothies.
Cool! I'll make you one too.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
No problem!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a writer. I write comics and graphic novels.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to write a comic book.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. I'll have to give it a try.
You should! I can help you if you need it.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem!
Well, I should probably get going. I have to get back to work.
Okay. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good day.
You too
